name: Persian
description: Its lithe muscles allow it to walk without making a sound. It attacks in an instant.

attacks.name: Sharpen Claws
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, discard a card from your opponent’s hand without looking.

attacks.name: Sneaky Attack
attacks.effect: If Persian has any Darkness Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.
